title: Pyramid of Menkaure
description: The Pyramid of Menkaure is the smallest of the three main pyramids located on the Giza plateau. It marks the tomb of the fourth dynasty Egyptian Pharaoh Menkaure.

properties.description: Pyramid on the Giza plateau marking the tomb of the fourth dynasty Egyptian Pharaoh Menkaure. Location based on OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location of the Pyramid of Menkaure
